backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor; no backend logic or changes required for mainnet deployment.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence entries linking features to frontend files and components for Home page UI updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists concise descriptions of all key frontend files and their roles in the site structure and features.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Checklist outlining frontend build and deployment steps for Internet Computer mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining brand color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, favicon, and mounting the React application.
frontend/RELEASE_NOTES.md: Mainnet release notes detailing features, routes, assets, configuration changes, and test checklists.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the router in ThemeProvider to enable routing and system-based theming.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandButto: Brand-styled wrapper around Button supporting primary, secondary, and accent variants.
Renders the brand logo with fallback to text if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/content/ContentR: Renders content sections and blocks including headings, paragraphs, lists, emphasis, and link-list grids.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the footer with brand info and navigation links for solutions, industries, and company sections.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Implements the site header with navigation, dropdowns, mobile menu, and solutions mega menu logic.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main layout combining header, routed content, footer, and scroll-sync provider.
frontend/src/components/layout/Solutions: Displays a two-column mega menu showing solution categories and previewing related services on hover.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Renders the homepage hero banner with branding, messaging, and call‑to‑action buttons.
Lists Google Drive source document URLs for manually maintained page content.
frontend/src/content/contentTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for structured page content blocks, sections, and pages.
frontend/src/content/pages.ts: Provides structured content definitions for all site pages, including solutions and services.
frontend/src/content/solutionServicePage: Defines detailed PageContent objects for solution service pages, including sections, text blocks, and feature lists.
frontend/src/content/solutionServices.ts: Provides a registry of service definitions mapping pageIds to titles, routes, and parent categories.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user’s Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDropdownHoverRegio: Tracks pointer position across trigger and dropdown panel to control hover-based opening and closing.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, identity loading, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageTitle.ts: Sets the document title using the page title and brand name, restoring the previous title on unmount.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module for future backend query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSolutionsActiveCat: Observes category sections with IntersectionObserver to report the most visible category using hysteresis.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive light/dark theme CSS variables plus base and utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/ContentPage.tsx: Renders dynamic content pages with themed styling, banner resolution, and fallback handling.
frontend/src/pages/CustomDomainPage.tsx: Displays instructions for setting up a custom domain with DNS guidance and a copyable hostname.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with a hero section and multiple content sections describing expertise and services.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Shows a 404 page with an illustration and a button linking back home.
Displays a solutions overview with a hero banner and scroll-synced category sections linking to service pages.
frontend/src/router/router.tsx: Defines the application's route tree using TanStack Router, including solutions, industries, and dynamic service routes.
frontend/src/site/brand.ts: Provides brand metadata such as name, domain, logo path, and contact details.
frontend/src/site/industryThemes.ts: Defines color themes for each industry page and exposes a helper to retrieve them by page ID.
frontend/src/site/navigation.ts: Defines the site's navigation structure with nested menu items and includes a helper to flatten all routes.
frontend/src/site/pageBannerResolver.ts: Resolves banner images for pages using filename conventions with fallback to a predefined banner map.
frontend/src/site/pageBanners.ts: Maps page IDs to their corresponding banner image paths and alt text.
frontend/src/site/pageThemes.ts: Computes theme settings for pages based on whether they're solution or industry pages.
frontend/src/solutions/solutionsScrollSy: Provides React context to track and reset the active solutions category based on navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, plugins, colors, fonts, and animations for the project.
project_state.json: Defines project state for organizing website pages into structured sections without altering text and lists existing and new feature requests related to Home page implementation.
